amendment.description: An amendment numbered 95 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to reduce to $1 the salary of the Director of the Office of Regulatory Policy at the FDA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 267 (Roll no. 427).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 267 (Roll no. 427).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
